ALT_APPDESC.message: Replace images with their alt text.

ALT_INFOBAR.message: Images have been replaced by their alt text.

LONGDESC_APPDESC.message: Right-click on anything with a "longdesc" or "aria-describedat" attribute to access its long description.

LONGDESC_CONTEXT_MENU_ITEM.message: Open Long Description In New Tab

LONGDESC_ADD_BORDER_CHECKBOX.message: Add border to elements with aria-describedat or longdesc attributes.

HIGHCONTRAST_APPDESC.message: Change or invert the colour scheme to make web pages easier to read.

CARET_BROWSING_ANIMATION.message: Highlight the cursor position with an animation.

CARET_BROWSING_APPDESC.message: Browse the text of web pages using arrow keys.

CARET_BROWSING_ENABLEDISABLECROS.message: Press Alt + (the Increase Brightness key, or F7) to turn on Caret Browsing. Press it again to turn it off.

CARET_BROWSING_ENABLEDISABLENONCROS.message: Press F7 to turn on Caret Browsing. Press it again to turn it off.

CARET_BROWSING_FLASH.message: Highlight the cursor position with a quick flash.

CARET_BROWSING_FOCUSHELP.message:
When you reach a link or control, it is automatically focused. Press Enter to click a link or button.

When a focused control (like a text box or a list box) is capturing arrow keys, press Esc followed by the left or right arrow to continue Caret Browsing.

Alternatively, press Tab to move to the next focusable control.

CARET_BROWSING_JUMP.message: When the caret jumps by a large distance:

CARET_BROWSING_MOVEBYWORDSMAC.message: Hold down Option to move by words.

CARET_BROWSING_MOVEBYWORDSNONMAC.message: Hold down Control to move by words.

CARET_BROWSING_NAVHELP.message:
Use arrow keys to move throughout the document.

Click anywhere to move the cursor to that location.

Press Shift + arrows to select text.

CARET_BROWSING_NOFEEDBACK.message: No feedback, just show the cursor.

CARET_BROWSING_SUBHEADING1.message: This extension gives you a movable cursor in the web page, allowing you to select text with the keyboard.

CARET_BROWSING_SUBHEADING2.message: Try it out now – Caret Browsing is always enabled on this page!

COLOR_ENHANCER_APPDESC.message: A customisable colour filter applied to web pages to improve colour perception.

COLOR_ENHANCER_TYPE_CHOICE.message: Step 1: Select the row with the faintest stars:

COLOR_ENHANCER_SEVERITY.message:
Step 2: Adjust the slider until all of the stars are visible in the
        selected row

ANIMATION_APPDESC.message: Run animations only once, or disable animation completely.

ANIMATION_ONCE.message: Allow animated images, but only once.
